name: Voyage and Return
description: Christopher Booker's archetypal plot where a character journeys to a strange world and returns transformed
distribution_philosophy: Based on Booker's voyage structure emphasizing the strange world experience and transformation upon return
examples: Alice in Wonderland, The Wizard of Oz, Avatar

ordinary_world.name: Ordinary World
ordinary_world.description: The character exists in their familiar, everyday environment

call_to_adventure.name: Call to Adventure
call_to_adventure.description: An opportunity or force draws the character away from their world

strange_world.name: Strange World
strange_world.description: The character enters and explores a world with different rules and logic

initial_fascination.name: Initial Fascination
initial_fascination.description: The character is initially enchanted by the strange world's possibilities

growing_threat.name: Growing Threat
growing_threat.description: The strange world reveals its dangerous or unsustainable nature

escape_and_return.name: Escape and Return
escape_and_return.description: The character escapes the strange world and returns home transformed
